physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water in the background together with land masses in the distance. At the foreground stands a rectangular tablet. There are some Chinese characters on the tablet but they are not fully discernable. A directory signboard is located to the left of the tablet. There are a couple of trees as well as shrubs present.
